about_the_game:
Wasps have been released into the field, and it's up to you to stop them - or at least try. Pick your favorite waspkeeper, carefully choose your powerups throughout your run and you might stand a chance against them! Waspkeeper is a retro-style action roguelite game where you're going to need to make the best build you can in order to survive the longest in this field full of venomous wasps.

>Main features:
- Four playable characters with unique stats;
- Level-based system;
- 15+ permanent powerups;
- Two types of attack (auto shooting and a special beetle attack);
- Increasingly difficult waves of enemies;
- 10+ types of wasps;
- Retro-style graphics;
- Wasp counter;
- Time survived counter.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu or similar
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 320
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.6 or similar
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 320
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Waspkeeper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 320
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Waspkeeper is an action roguelite game where your main goal is to survive as long as possible in a field full of venomous wasps with one out of four playable characters.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
